text: allahanu nimage, nivu dharala yud'dha sampattannu galisuvirendu vagdana madiddanu. Avaniga bahubegane adannu nimage kottiruvanu hagu nim'ma virud'dha (ettadante) janara kaigalannu tadedittiruvanu. (Idu,) visvasigala palige puraveyagalikkagi hagu nim'mannu sthiravada sanmargadedege nadesalikkagi
